item.title: SMSStart.ini file
item.dc:creator: dava-LOC
item.description: Information The SMSStart.ini file contains the configuration for the SMSStart utility. The majority of the settings are modified using the configuration button on the SMSStart application, and would rarely need to be modified manually. This document describes the key settings in the SMSStart.ini file set through the configuration function of SMSStart as well as the […]

item.title: SMSInstall.ini, Update.ini and Version.ini files
item.dc:creator: dava-LOC
item.description: Information This document provides a place where issues regarding the SMSInstall.ini, Update.ini and Version.ini files can be discussed. The goal is to provide a unique location to contain the documentation on all aspects of these configuration files. It does not serve to replace documentation found elsewhere, but it acts as a complement to it. SMSInstall.ini, […]
